attributes.action: To make all the worlds commercial banks and central banks bad banks and create one universal world bank and one universal world currency based on gold again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make all worlds commercial banks and central banks into bad banks as they are all in a defecit and create one universal world bank,one universal social security and one universal world currency based on gold again.this will create a fresh start.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
